channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Wild Hokkaido!
channel.desc: An expert cycling duo cuts across the Shiretoko peninsula, a World Natural Heritage site located in eastern Hokkaido. They excitedly introduce the local wildlife and magnificent summer views en route.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-13.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: Cats live near three torii gates in the sea. The beach changes at low tide. We also meet a cat who lives in a pottery production area. She's allowed in all the shops and inspects the merchandise.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Anime Manga Explosion
channel.desc: This episode spotlights director Yoshiura Yasuhiro, known for Sing a Bit of Harmony. We present three pivotal shorts and take a look at his bold creative experiments with kaiju, comedy, and robots.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Take Tech
channel.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Somewhere Street
channel.desc: A unique walking-eye view of cities around the globe! Chat to the locals and enjoy encounters that only strolling the streets can bring.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hit The Road
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a wide range of programs from news, current affairs, documentaries, etc. focusing on Japan and Asia.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Today: identifying your chance to speak at a meeting. Timothy James Mahrt, from the United States, works at an IT firm in Tokyo. He has difficulty finding the right time to speak up.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese
channel.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Filmmaker Soda Kazuhiro, whose latest work won the Best Movie Award at a film festival in 2024, tells us about the "observational" documentary style he has been championing for 20 years.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Disasters resulting from torrential rain are occurring almost every year. The main reason for the increasing severity of the damage is river flooding. What is responsible for the growing damage.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: #42 I'm going to give them to Yuuki-san. / To explain what you intend to do, say a verb followed by "tsumori desu." So "watasu" (to give) becomes "watasu tsumori desu.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: This program introduces NHK's new AI-powered Swahili voice service and covers an NHK World-Japan-related event held at the Embassy of Tanzania in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
channel.desc: For Kajika frogs, romance is "ribbeting." Melodies reach ultrasonic frequencies. Battles feature headlocks and chokeholds. The tightest embrace allows pairs to squeeze into tight crevices to spawn.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Tsutaju
channel.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode features ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's "The Actor Ichikawa Ebizo as Takemura Sadanoshin.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: People from around the globe who put down roots in Japan offer a glimpse into their lives and the hardships they face in Japanese society.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to fish. Explore the unique culture behind them.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Culture Crossroads comprises several regular programs with the theme of creating a multicultural society. They look at international exchange programs and give tips on disaster preparedness.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hit The Road
channel.desc: Take a drive in Fukushima! 13 years since the disaster, see its rejuvenated community and daily life. Visit the rest stop emblematic of this resilience and sense the locals' unyielding spirit.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: The Bird Cafe
channel.desc: We visit an Edo-style open-air teahouse, where the townspeople enjoyed refreshments, conversation, and the company of exotic birds. For them, these outings were about more than a good time.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dig More Japan
channel.desc: Some 70% of Japan's land is covered in mountains and forests. We dig a little deeper and trek out into the Japanese mountains.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: From prevention to cure! The groundbreaking world of Japanese medical technology and healthcare. For your healthy lifestyle, this program shows tips of superfoods and easy exercises.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Explore a different side of Japan. Meet the locals and discover traditions and cultures not usually found in guidebooks.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Takahara Miki is a nurse with long years of experience in conflict and disaster zones. In 2023, she received the Florence Nightingale Medal. She shares her thoughts on international relief work.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: A Stylish Concert
channel.desc: We attend a New Year's concert at a samurai residence, where a master koto player delights a crowd of gorgeously dressed celebrity-types. Lounging in the best seat in the house is no ordinary V.I.P.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: Chef Rika makes oyakodon, a Japanese dish of chicken and eggs simmered in a sweet and savory sauce, served over rice. She demonstrates a clever technique for making the eggs soft and golden.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: Three days in the life of...Stay in one location for 72 hours, catching glimpses into people's lives as they open up and share.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: Researchers pursue the mysteries of the sun in order to prevent damage to telecommunications equipment and potential space disasters caused by the magnetic storms following major solar flares.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Explore a different side of Japan. Meet the locals and discover traditions and cultures not usually found in guidebooks.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Deeper Look
channel.desc: An experienced anchor Del Irani has a cutting-edge dialogue with a first-class guest on a current-affairs topics.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
channel.desc: Featured recipe: Chicken Thigh Kara-age Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking with Chef Rika in five minutes.
